gurmukhi: ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾਣ ਪਾਣ ਜੇ ਜਪੈ ॥ ਅਨੰਤ ਥਾਟ ਤੇ ਥਪੈ ॥
transliteration: Kridaan Paan Je Japai|| Anant Thaat Te Thapai||
translation: Those who meditate on the Supreme KAL, the wielder of the sword, they firmly adopt innumerable measures for protection.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਤੇਕ ਕਾਲ ਧਯਾੲਿ ਹੈ ॥ ਜਗਤ ਜੀਤ ਜਾੲਿ ਹੈ ॥੭੯॥
transliteration: Jitek Kaal Dhyaae Hai|| Jagad Jeet Jaae Hai||79||
translation: Those who remember KAL, they conquer the world and depart.79.
That Supreme KAL is Supremely Pure, whose image is supernatural and winsome.

gurmukhi: ਅਲੋਕ ਰੂਪ ਰਾਜਿਯੰ ॥ ਸੁਣੇ ਸੁ ਪਾਪ ਭਾਜਿਯੰ ॥੮੦॥
transliteration: Alok Roop Raajiyan|| Soune Su Paap Bhaajiyan||80||
translation: He is bedecked with supernatural beauty, all the sins flee on hearing His Name.80.

gurmukhi: ਬਿਸਾਲ ਲਾਲ ਲੋਚਨੰ ॥ ਬਿਅੰਤ ਪਾਪ ਮੋਚਨੰ ॥
transliteration: Bisaal Laal Lochanndng|| Biant Paap Mochanndng||
translation: He, who hath wide and red eyes, and who is the destroyer of innumerable sins.

gurmukhi: ਚਮੱਕ ਚੰਦ੍ਰ ਚਾਰੀਅੰ ॥ ਅਘੀ ਅਨੇਕ ਤਾਰੀਅੰ ॥੮੧॥
transliteration: Chamakk Channdra Chdarooan|| Aghoo Anek Tdarooan||81||
translation: The glitter of his face is more beautiful than that of the moon and who hath caused many sinners to ferry across.81.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਤੇ ਲੋਕ ਪਾਲੰ ॥ ਤਿਤੇ ਜੇਰ ਕਾਲੰ ॥
transliteration: Jite Lok Paalan|| Tite Jer Kaalan||
translation: All the Lokpals are subservient to KAL.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਤੇ ਸੂਰ ਚੰਦ੍ਰੰ ॥ ਕਹਾ ੲਿੰਦ੍ਰ ਬਿੰਦ੍ਰੰ ॥੮੨॥
transliteration: Jite Soor Channdran|| Kahaa Indra Bindran||82||
translation: All the suns and moons and even Indra and Vaman (are subservient to KAL.82.

gurmukhi: ਫਿਰੇ ਚੌਦਹੂੰ ਲੋਕਯੰ ਕਾਲ ਚਕ੍ਰੰ ॥ ਸਭੈ ਨਾਥ ਨਾਥੇ ਭ੍ਰਮੰ ਭੳੁਂਹ ਬਕ੍ਰੰ ॥
transliteration: Phire Chaudahoon Lokayan Kaal Chakran|| Sabhai Naath Naathe Bhramannd Bhaounh Bakran||
translation: All the fourteen worlds are under the Command of KAL. He hath stringed all the Naths by turning about the slanting evebrows.

gurmukhi: ਕਹਾ ਰਾਮ ਕ੍ਰਿਸਨੰ ਕਹਾ ਚੰਦ ਸੂਰੰ ॥ ਸਭੈ ਹਾਥ ਬਾਧੇ ਖਰੇ ਕਾਲ ਹਜੂਰੰ ॥੮੩॥
transliteration: Kahaa Raam Krisanan Kahaa Channd Sooran|| Sabhai Haath Baadhe Kdare Kaal Hajooran||83||
translation: May be Rama and Krishna, may be the moon and sun, all are standing with folded hands in the presence of KAL.83.

gurmukhi: ਕਾਲ ਹੀ ਪਾੲਿ ਭਯੋ ਭਗਵਾਨ ਸੁ ਜਾਗਤ ਯਾ ਜਗ ਜਾ ਕੀ ਕਲਾ ਹੈ ॥
transliteration: Kaal Hoo Paae Bhayo Bhagvaan Su Jaagad Yaa Jag Jaa Koo Kalaa Hai||
translation: At the instance of KAL, Vishnu appeared, whose power is manifested through the world.
